root.name: War of The Immortals
root.description: OverviewWar of the Immortals in an action MMORPG developed and published by Perfect World Entertainment and is a follow up to Battle of the Immortals. Due to the fact that it is a sequel, it shares many of the same traits as it's predecessor such as action orientated hack 'n' slash gameplay with a top down view, similar to that of Diablo. It features new pets, skills, weapon, gear and a world with brand new dungeons, quests, etc to explore.Open BetaThe open beta for War of the Immortals opened on December 1st 2011. All players who sign up before December 31st have a chance to win $2500 worth of prizes including gaming hardware, game-related collectibles, in-game currency, and a computer.System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows 2000Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 at 1GHzMemory: 1 GB RAMGraphics: GeForce 4 Ti4200 64MB or ATI Radeon 8500 64MBDirectX速: 9.0cHard Drive: 4 GB HD spaceOther Requirements: Broadband Internet connectionRecommendedOS: Windows 7Processor: Dual-Core 2.5GHz CPU or better recommendedMemory: 3 GB RAMGraphics: GeForce FX 5200 128MB or ATI Radeon 9500 128MBDirectX速: 9.0cHard Drive: 8 GB HD spaceOther Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
